name: Lily the Bee
description:
### Story
This is the story of Lily the bee,  
against moths threatening her hive,  
each time trying to stay alive,  
which is now a kind of monotony.  
Some nectar can help her,  
quitting this boring loop,  
but will this kind of soup,  
get her into another?  

### Controls
* __← → :__ Move the Bee
* __Space:__ Shoot
* __Enter:__ Drink nectar

### Softwares & ressources
* Unity & Visual Studio
* Krita
* Tracktion Waveform & Audacity
* Font: https://www.dafont.com/fr/schoolwork.font

### Credits
